attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned wish the Government to keep the Victim Commissioners post OPEN.
The Government needs a Commissioner who puts the need, wants and voices of victims first. Without this, victims of every type of crime will go unheard and unnoticed. Victims are continually still being let down by the System and we need this post to remain to ensure victims needs, rights and voices are at the top of the Agenda
